content: Q3 made a significant recovery of the profitability of car manufacturers to set update for Autohome according to the CTCA this year, China passenger vehicle sales Q1 year-on-year decrease of 4.5%, and Q2 year-on-year decrease of 9.8% and Q3 year-on-year growth of 23.7%, according to National Statistics Bureau in the first nine months of this year that automobile manufacturing revenue has a synchronized growth of 6.7% and profit over RMB370 billion year-on-year decrease of 1.9% and the decreased margin compared to January to August has narrowed by 5.4 percentage points.
